about.p1: I'm Stephan Gilles and I build web applications with a focus on clear structure, clean UI and reliable functionality. Currently I work on Angular projects and deepen TypeScript as well as modern frontend patterns.
about.p2: What matters to me: maintainable code – clear naming, small functions, clean component structure and a stable Git workflow.
